title: Shopify Expert
job_overview:
About Us
We are an established Dutch e?commerce brand gearing up to expand our flagship Shopify store into two new markets: Germany (DE) and North America (EN). We run lean, move fast, and value clear documentation.

What You’ll Do

Rebuild and fine?tune our existing Shopify store on the Concept theme for DE and EN/US markets.

Re?install & configure all previously used apps (Replo, Klaviyo, review apps, shipping, etc.) ensuring full functionality.

Migrate/translate all content from Dutch using AI tools; spot?check for accuracy and SEO friendliness.

Implement market?specific settings (languages, currencies, shipping).

Keep theme code organised; create custom sections/blocks only when necessary through Replo.

Maintain clear task lists in Notion and Google Sheets; send concise end?of?day Slack updates.

Must?Have Skills & Tools

???? Expert?level Shopify Admin & theme configuration

Liquid/HTML/CSS basics for theme tweaks

Experience with Replo landing?page builder

Comfortable with AI translation workflows

Google Sheet power?user

Self?starter who documents everything and works independently with minimal supervision

Excellent written English


Hours & Logistics

15–20 hours per week, fully flexible (no required overlap with EU time zone)
Start ASAP (late June 2025)

Initial 2?month contract with strong potential to grow into a long?term role

Reporting
Daily end?of?day progress report in Notion/Google Sheet and quick check?in on Slack.

Compensation
Please state your desired hourly rate in PHP. We review every application individually.

Perks

Flexible hours
Opportunity to take full ownership of multi?store build?out
Potential for extended contract and more hours as we scale
